ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MAVEN SWIA Calibrated Onboard Survey Spectra Data Collection

RevisionEvent.Note: Draft metadata created by LFB (ADAPT code), final editing by AK

ResourceHeader.Description: SWIA onboard spectra files with time-ordered angle-averaged ion energy spectra in units of differential energy flux, as computed onboard from Coarse ion distributions, as well as a header with ancillary information needed to interpret the spectra. Description of the SWIA instrument can be found on the SWIA home page https://lasp.colorado.edu/maven/science/instrument-package/swia/ and in the SWIA instrument publication https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-013-0029-z.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J.S. Halekas for use of these data.

Parameter.Name: Time, start of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Description: Time, start of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, start of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, start of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, start of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, start of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Raw Instrument Counts (as spectrogram)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Raw Instrument Counts (as time series).
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: spectra_counts.

Parameter.Name: Calibrated differential energy flux (as spectrogram)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Calibrated differential energy flux (as overlaid time series)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Calibrated differential energy flux (as overlaid time series)
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: spectra_diff_en_fluxes.

Parameter.Name: Attenuator state
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Attenuator state, 1 = open, 2 = closed, 3 = cover closed

Parameter.Name: Number of Accumulations Summed
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Decommutation Flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Decommutation Flag: 0 = uncertain mode/attenuator flags, 1 = known mode/attenuator flags
